headline.main: Johnson's Special Message to Congress Outlining Broad National Health Program

docs.abstract: AEC approves Washington U shipment of small amt of radioisotopes for research
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 7 (AP) -- Following is the text of President Johnson's special message today to Congress on health:

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 7 -President Johnson proposed today a broad national health program including health care for the aged and needy children and regional medical complexes to combat heart disease, cancer, stroke and other major illnesses.

headline.main: JOHNSON HEALTH PROGRAM GIVES MEDICARE PRIORITY; REGIONAL CENTERS SOUGHT; PASSAGE IS LIKELY Added Social Security Trust Fund Asked to Finance Aid to Aged Johnson Health Program Gives Priority to Bill on Care of Aged.
